00026 static hpss_authn_mech_t  FSAL_auth_mech;
00027 
00028 #endif

00030 static char FSAL_PrincipalName[HPSS_MAX_PRINCIPAL_NAME];
00031 static char FSAL_KeytabPath[HPSS_MAX_PATH_NAME];

00033 
00035 static int HPSSFSAL_SecInit( fs_specific_initinfo_t * hpss_init_info ){
00036 
00037   int rc;
00038 
00039 #ifdef _USE_HPSS_51    
00040 
00042   rc = hpss_SetLoginContext( FSAL_PrincipalName, FSAL_KeytabPath );
00043   
00044   DisplayLogJdLevel( fsal_log, NIV_DEBUG, "FSAL SEC INIT: DCE principal is set to '%s'",
00045     FSAL_PrincipalName );      
00046   DisplayLogJdLevel( fsal_log, NIV_DEBUG, "FSAL SEC INIT: Keytab is set to '%s'",
00047     FSAL_KeytabPath );
00048   
00049 #elif defined _USE_HPSS_62
00050   hpss_rpc_auth_type_t auth_type;
00051   
00052   rc = hpss_GetAuthType( FSAL_auth_mech, &auth_type );
00053   if ( rc != 0 ) return rc;
00054   
00055   if ( auth_type != hpss_rpc_auth_type_keytab && auth_type != hpss_rpc_auth_type_keyfile )
00056   {
00057     return ERR_FSAL_INVAL;
00058   }
00059   
00060   rc = hpss_SetLoginCred( FSAL_PrincipalName,
00061                           FSAL_auth_mech,
00062                           auth_type,
00063                           hpss_rpc_cred_client,
00064                           (void*)FSAL_KeytabPath );
00065   
00066   DisplayLogJdLevel( fsal_log, NIV_DEBUG, "FSAL SEC INIT: Auth Mech is set to '%s'",
00067     hpss_AuthnMechTypeString( FSAL_auth_mech ) );  
00068   DisplayLogJdLevel( fsal_log, NIV_DEBUG, "FSAL SEC INIT: Auth Type is set to '%s'",
00069     hpss_AuthenticatorTypeString( auth_type ) );
00070   DisplayLogJdLevel( fsal_log, NIV_DEBUG, "FSAL SEC INIT: Principal is set to '%s'",
00071     FSAL_PrincipalName );      
00072   DisplayLogJdLevel( fsal_log, NIV_DEBUG, "FSAL SEC INIT: Keytab is set to '%s'",
00073     FSAL_KeytabPath );  
00074   
00075 #endif
00076   
00077   return rc;
00078   
00079 }

00082 /* Macros for analysing parameters. */
00083 #define SET_BITMAP_PARAM( api_cfg, p_init_info, _field )      \
00084     switch( (p_init_info)->behaviors._field ){                \
00085       case FSAL_INIT_FORCE_VALUE :                            \
00086         /* force the value in any case */                     \
00087         api_cfg._field = (p_init_info)->hpss_config._field;   \
00088         break;                                                \
00089       case FSAL_INIT_MAX_LIMIT :                              \
00090         /* remove the flags not specified by user (AND) */    \
00091         api_cfg._field &= (p_init_info)->hpss_config._field;  \
00092         break;                                                \
00093       case FSAL_INIT_MIN_LIMIT :                              \
00094         /* add the flags specified by user (OR) */            \
00095         api_cfg._field |= (p_init_info)->hpss_config._field;  \
00096         break;                                                \
00097     /* In the other cases, we keep the default value. */      \
00098     }                                                         \
00099 
00100 
00101 #define SET_INTEGER_PARAM( api_cfg, p_init_info, _field )         \
00102     switch( (p_init_info)->behaviors._field ){                    \
00103     case FSAL_INIT_FORCE_VALUE :                                  \
00104         /* force the value in any case */                         \
00105         api_cfg._field = (p_init_info)->hpss_config._field;       \
00106         break;                                                \
00107     case FSAL_INIT_MAX_LIMIT :                                    \
00108       /* check the higher limit */                                \
00109       if ( api_cfg._field > (p_init_info)->hpss_config._field )   \
00110         api_cfg._field = (p_init_info)->hpss_config._field ;      \
00111         break;                                                \
00112     case FSAL_INIT_MIN_LIMIT :                                    \
00113       /* check the lower limit */                                 \
00114       if ( api_cfg._field < (p_init_info)->hpss_config._field )   \
00115         api_cfg._field = (p_init_info)->hpss_config._field ;      \
00116         break;                                                \
00117     /* In the other cases, we keep the default value. */          \
00118     }                                                             \
00119 
00120   
00121 #define SET_STRING_PARAM( api_cfg, p_init_info, _field )          \
00122     switch( (p_init_info)->behaviors._field ){                    \
00123     case FSAL_INIT_FORCE_VALUE :                                  \
00124       /* force the value in any case */                           \
00125       strcpy(api_cfg._field,(p_init_info)->hpss_config._field);   \
00126       break;                                                \
00127     /* In the other cases, we keep the default value. */          \
00128     }                                                             \
00129 
00130 
00131 static int HPSSFSAL_Init( fs_specific_initinfo_t * hpss_init_info ){
00132 
00133   int rc = 0;
00134   api_config_t    hpss_config;
00135 
00136   if (!hpss_init_info) return ERR_FSAL_FAULT;
00137     
00138   /* First, get current values for config. */
00139   
00140   if (rc = hpss_GetConfiguration(&hpss_config))
00141     return rc;
00142   
00143 
00144 #ifdef _USE_HPSS_51
00145     
00146   /* Then analyze user's init info. */
00147   
00148   SET_STRING_PARAM( hpss_config, hpss_init_info,  PrincipalName )
00149   SET_STRING_PARAM( hpss_config, hpss_init_info,  KeytabPath )
00150   
00151   /* retrieve authentication values. */
00152   strcpy(FSAL_PrincipalName, hpss_config.PrincipalName );
00153   strcpy(FSAL_KeytabPath, hpss_config.KeytabPath );
00154     
00155 #elif defined _USE_HPSS_62
00156   
00157 #define API_DEBUG_ERROR    (1)
00158 #define API_DEBUG_REQUEST  (2)
00159 #define API_DEBUG_TRACE    (4)
00160   
00161   
00162   hpss_config.Flags |= API_USE_CONFIG;
00163   
00164   /* retrieve authentication mechanism */
00165   
00166   if ( hpss_init_info->behaviors.AuthnMech == FSAL_INIT_FORCE_VALUE )
00167   {
00168     FSAL_auth_mech = hpss_init_info->hpss_config.AuthnMech;
00169     hpss_config.AuthnMech = hpss_init_info->hpss_config.AuthnMech;
00170   }
00171   else
00172   {
00173     FSAL_auth_mech = hpss_config.AuthnMech;
00174   }
00175     
00176   if ( hpss_init_info->behaviors.NumRetries == FSAL_INIT_FORCE_VALUE )
00177     hpss_config.NumRetries = hpss_init_info->hpss_config.NumRetries;
00178   
00179   if ( hpss_init_info->behaviors.BusyRetries == FSAL_INIT_FORCE_VALUE )
00180     hpss_config.BusyRetries = hpss_init_info->hpss_config.BusyRetries;
00181   
00182   if ( hpss_init_info->behaviors.BusyDelay == FSAL_INIT_FORCE_VALUE )
00183     hpss_config.BusyDelay = hpss_init_info->hpss_config.BusyDelay;
00184 
00185   if ( hpss_init_info->behaviors.BusyRetries == FSAL_INIT_FORCE_VALUE )
00186     hpss_config.BusyRetries = hpss_init_info->hpss_config.BusyRetries;
00187 
00188   if ( hpss_init_info->behaviors.MaxConnections == FSAL_INIT_FORCE_VALUE )
00189     hpss_config.MaxConnections = hpss_init_info->hpss_config.MaxConnections;
00190 
00191   if ( hpss_init_info->behaviors.Principal == FSAL_INIT_FORCE_VALUE )
00192     strcpy( FSAL_PrincipalName , hpss_init_info->Principal );
00193 
00194   if ( hpss_init_info->behaviors.KeytabPath == FSAL_INIT_FORCE_VALUE )
00195     strcpy( FSAL_KeytabPath, hpss_init_info->KeytabPath );
00196 
00197   if ( hpss_init_info->behaviors.DebugPath == FSAL_INIT_FORCE_VALUE )
00198   {
00199     strcpy( hpss_config.DebugPath, hpss_init_info->hpss_config.DebugPath );
00200     hpss_config.DebugValue |= API_DEBUG_ERROR | API_DEBUG_REQUEST | API_DEBUG_TRACE ;
00201     hpss_config.Flags |= API_ENABLE_LOGGING ;
00202   }  
00203   
00204   /* Display Clapi configuration */
00205   
00206   DisplayLogJdLevel( fsal_log, NIV_DEBUG, "HPSS Client API configuration:");
00207   DisplayLogJdLevel( fsal_log, NIV_DEBUG, "  Flags: %08X", hpss_config.Flags);
00208   DisplayLogJdLevel( fsal_log, NIV_DEBUG, "  TransferType: %d", hpss_config.TransferType);
00209   DisplayLogJdLevel( fsal_log, NIV_DEBUG, "  NumRetries: %d", hpss_config.NumRetries);
00210   DisplayLogJdLevel( fsal_log, NIV_DEBUG, "  BusyDelay: %d", hpss_config.BusyDelay);
00211   DisplayLogJdLevel( fsal_log, NIV_DEBUG, "  BusyRetries: %d", hpss_config.BusyRetries);
00212   DisplayLogJdLevel( fsal_log, NIV_DEBUG, "  TotalDelay: %d", hpss_config.TotalDelay);
00213   DisplayLogJdLevel( fsal_log, NIV_DEBUG, "  LimitedRetries: %d", hpss_config.LimitedRetries);
00214   DisplayLogJdLevel( fsal_log, NIV_DEBUG, "  MaxConnections: %d", hpss_config.MaxConnections);
00215   DisplayLogJdLevel( fsal_log, NIV_DEBUG, "  ReuseDataConnections: %d", hpss_config.ReuseDataConnections);
00216   DisplayLogJdLevel( fsal_log, NIV_DEBUG, "  UsePortRange: %d", hpss_config.UsePortRange);
00217   DisplayLogJdLevel( fsal_log, NIV_DEBUG, "  RetryStageInp: %d", hpss_config.RetryStageInp);
00218   DisplayLogJdLevel( fsal_log, NIV_DEBUG, "  DebugValue: %#X", hpss_config.DebugValue);
00219   DisplayLogJdLevel( fsal_log, NIV_DEBUG, "  DebugPath: %s", hpss_config.DebugPath);
00220   
00221 #endif
00222   
00223   strcpy(  hpss_config.DescName, "hpss.ganesha.nfsd" );
00224     
00225   /* set the final configuration */
00226   rc = hpss_SetConfiguration( &hpss_config ) ;
00227   
00228   return rc;
00229   
00230 }
00231 
00232 
00254 fsal_status_t  FSAL_Init(
00255     fsal_parameter_t        * init_info         /* IN */
00256 ){
00257   
00258   fsal_status_t status;
00259   hpss_fileattr_t rootattr;
00260   int rc;
00261               
00262   /* sanity check.  */
00263   
00264   if (!init_info)
00265     Return(ERR_FSAL_FAULT ,0 , INDEX_FSAL_Init);
00266   
00267 
00268   /* Check for very important args */
00269 
00270   if ( init_info->fsal_info.log_outputs.liste_voies == NULL )
00271   {
00272     /* issue a warning on stderr */
00273     DisplayLog("FSAL INIT: *** WARNING: No logging file specified for FileSystem Abstraction Layer.");
00274   }
00275 
00276 #ifdef _USE_HPSS_51
00277   
00278   if ( init_info->fs_specific_info.behaviors.KeytabPath == FSAL_INIT_FS_DEFAULT )
00279   {
00280     /* issue a warning on stderr if no credential is specified*/
00281     DisplayLog("FSAL INIT: *** WARNING: No keytab file specified for HPSS, default client keytab will be used...");
00282     DisplayLog("FSAL INIT: ***          Set %s::KeytabPath into config file to use another keytab", CONF_LABEL_FS_SPECIFIC);
00283   }
00284   
00285   if ( init_info->fs_specific_info.behaviors.PrincipalName == FSAL_INIT_FS_DEFAULT )
00286   {
00287     /* issue a warning on stderr if no credential is specified*/
00288     DisplayLog("FSAL INIT: *** WARNING: No principal name specified for HPSS, default will be used...");
00289     DisplayLog("FSAL INIT: ***          Set %s::PrincipalName into config file to use another principal", CONF_LABEL_FS_SPECIFIC);
00290   }
00291   
00292 #elif defined _USE_HPSS_62
00293   
00294   if ( init_info->fs_specific_info.behaviors.AuthnMech == FSAL_INIT_FS_DEFAULT )
00295   {
00296     /* issue a warning on stderr if no credential is specified*/
00297     DisplayLog("FSAL INIT: *** WARNING: No authentication mechanism specified for HPSS, default authentication mechanism will be used...");
00298     DisplayLog("FSAL INIT: ***          Set %s::AuthMech into config file to use another Authentication Mechanism", CONF_LABEL_FS_SPECIFIC);
00299   }  
00300 
00301   if ( init_info->fs_specific_info.behaviors.KeytabPath == FSAL_INIT_FS_DEFAULT )
00302   {
00303     /* issue a warning on stderr if no credential is specified*/
00304     DisplayLog("FSAL INIT: *** WARNING: No keytab file specified for HPSS, default client keytab will be used...");
00305     DisplayLog("FSAL INIT: ***          Set %s::KeytabPath into config file to use another keytab", CONF_LABEL_FS_SPECIFIC);
00306   }
00307   
00308   if ( init_info->fs_specific_info.behaviors.Principal == FSAL_INIT_FS_DEFAULT )
00309   {
00310     /* issue a warning on stderr if no credential is specified*/
00311     DisplayLog("FSAL INIT: *** WARNING: No principal name specified for HPSS, default principal name will be used...");
00312     DisplayLog("FSAL INIT: ***          Set %s::PrincipalName into config file to use another principal", CONF_LABEL_FS_SPECIFIC);
00313   }
00314   
00315 #endif
00316     
00317   /* proceeds FSAL internal initialization */
00318   
00319   status = fsal_internal_init_global( &(init_info->fsal_info),
00320                                       &(init_info->fs_common_info) );  
00321   
00322   if (FSAL_IS_ERROR(status)) Return(status.major,status.minor,INDEX_FSAL_Init);
00323 
00324 
00325   /* configure HPSS cl api  
00326     (and retrieve current PrincipalName and KeytabName)*/
00327   
00328   if (rc = HPSSFSAL_Init( &init_info->fs_specific_info ))
00329     Return( ERR_FSAL_BAD_INIT, -rc , INDEX_FSAL_Init);
00330   
00331   /* Init security context */
00332   
00333   if ( rc = HPSSFSAL_SecInit( &init_info->fs_specific_info ))  
00334     Return( ERR_FSAL_SEC , -rc, INDEX_FSAL_Init);    
00335       
00336 
00337   /* sets the credential renewal time */
00338   
00339   switch( init_info->fs_specific_info.behaviors.CredentialLifetime )
00340   {
00341     case FSAL_INIT_FORCE_VALUE :
00342         /* force the value in any case */
00343         fsal_internal_SetCredentialLifetime(  init_info->fs_specific_info.CredentialLifetime );
00344         break;
00345     /* In the other cases, we keep the default value. */
00346   }
00347 
00348   /* sets behavior for inconsistent directory entries */
00349   
00350   switch( init_info->fs_specific_info.behaviors.ReturnInconsistentDirent )
00351   {
00352     case FSAL_INIT_FORCE_VALUE :
00353         /* force the value in any case */
00354         fsal_internal_SetReturnInconsistentDirent(  init_info->fs_specific_info.ReturnInconsistentDirent );
00355         break;
00356     /* In the other cases, we keep the default value. */
00357   }
00358       
00359   /* Everything went OK. */
00360   
00361   Return(ERR_FSAL_NO_ERROR,0,INDEX_FSAL_Init);  
00362   
00363 }
